message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find very valuable. I'm offering it to you for $130.  What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I'm willing to make a deal at that price, but I'm not sure I can go any higher.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but $120 is a bit too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $125?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit lower on the price. I'm willing to go up to $115. Can you consider that?
